My name is Jyri and I am a software develper. I Like working on building/testing website backends Flask/Django and creating tools in Python

I am currently working on honing my web design skills with more HTML5/CCS3 tricks and Javascript. Interested on the side to learning TailwindCSS, Bootstrap and JQuery.

In my free time I love going to family summer cabin in the middle fo nature to get away from the city crowds. I play videogammes as my hobby and love travelling around the world.
